attributes.action: resist pressure from the EU to allow larger lorries on UK roads.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Swedish government has vowed to use its presidency of the EU this year to push for a new type of 25m long, 60 ton (more than a fully-laden Boeing 737-300) ‘mega-truck’ to be permitted on all EU roads.

These are a danger to other road users, will cause major, expensive-to-repair damage to road surfaces and nearby structures, and worsen congestion on smaller roads. 

We call on the government to ban these vehicles from UK roads, and to encourage and facilitate the transport of loads of this size by rail.
